job_title: Registered Dental Hygienist in Maplewood, MN
pros: The atmosphere is excellent with generally no workplace drama and overall really friendly people. The managers and higher-ups are excellent and the company is flexible to fit your needs.
cons: Super busy clinic (Maplewood) where it's easy to get overwhelmed if it's a high traffic day with a lot of ER patients or patients with complex cases.

pros:
Some nice people
Enjoyed having students around doing externships
Liked getting to leave early if patients did t show up
cons:
Some not so nice people
No structure to dental team...DDS not assigned to do exams...led to DDSs all trying to avoid challenging exams.
Very short amount of time allotted for hygiene appointments 
Shift change is very chaotic

review_title: My experience as a scheduling coordinator
pros: Easy hours, diverse staff, feel good about helping the community.
cons: Not much growth, pay is low, patient interaction is occasionally stressful.

pros: Good learning experience and good for training.
cons: No paid vacation, not competitive pay

pros:
Flexible schedule
Great FT benefit
Great entry level or part time gig.
Can move your way up.
cons:
Non-competitive pay
Sometimes the staff show favoritism because they tend to be related a lot.

review_title: Everyone is great to work with.  Management needs more work, doesn't know how to keep employees.
pros: Raises come easily for dental assistants but if you are other staff don't think about it. Doctors are great to work with.  Assistants all work well together. Everyone helps one another.
cons: Always new staff, high turnover rate. Hard to have new staff all the time and the clinic is so fast paced that we are appreciated for the work we do.

review_title: A great place to work and healthy environment
pros: No micro management. Lots of  Kindness.  We serve with love and with compassion. Multicultural environment.
cons: You might not become a millinaire working here  but there is a lot of satisfaction helping the unserseved.
